Class RecordListTest

public class RecordListTest extends Object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private com.example.cardiocare.Record
    mockRecord()
    This is a method to create mock Record
    private com.example.cardiocare.RecordList
    mockRecordList()
    This is a method to create mock recordList This simply creates a instance of RecordList and also adds a mock Record and returns the list
    void
    testAddRecord()
    This is a method to test add record operation It adds a record and checks the size of the list, expected 1 Then adds another record and again checks the size, expected 2 Then checks if the last record exists in list or not Then deletes all the record from the list
    void
    testAddRecordException()
    This tests the add exception in list Simply same record cannot be inserted twice, so it will simply throw IllegalArgumentException
    void
    testDeleteRecord()
    This tests get record method In this, one data have been inserted and after insertion the size of the list has been checked Then deleted the record and check if the size becomes 0 or not And the tried to delete from empty list and expected Exception
    void
    testGetRecords()
    This tests get record method In this, two data have been inserted and after every insertion the size of the list has been checked Also checked if appropriate data is present at expected index.
    void
    testGetSortedRecords()
    This tests get record method In this, two data have been inserted and after every insertion the size of the list has been checked Then collected the record list in a sorted order based on systolic pressure so the last record should be placed at index:0
    void
    testUpdateRecord()
    This tests get record method In this, one data have been inserted and after insertion the size of the list has been checked Then a new record object has been created and an update operation has been performed at index = ( previous data) Then checked if updated data is present on the list at expected index

    • testAddRecord

      public void testAddRecord()
      This is a method to test add record operation It adds a record and checks the size of the list, expected 1 Then adds another record and again checks the size, expected 2 Then checks if the last record exists in list or not Then deletes all the record from the list

    • testAddRecordException

      public void testAddRecordException()
      This tests the add exception in list Simply same record cannot be inserted twice, so it will simply throw IllegalArgumentException

    • testGetRecords

      public void testGetRecords()
      This tests get record method In this, two data have been inserted and after every insertion the size of the list has been checked Also checked if appropriate data is present at expected index.

    • testGetSortedRecords

      public void testGetSortedRecords()
      This tests get record method In this, two data have been inserted and after every insertion the size of the list has been checked Then collected the record list in a sorted order based on systolic pressure so the last record should be placed at index:0

    • testDeleteRecord

      public void testDeleteRecord()
      This tests get record method In this, one data have been inserted and after insertion the size of the list has been checked Then deleted the record and check if the size becomes 0 or not And the tried to delete from empty list and expected Exception

    • testUpdateRecord

      public void testUpdateRecord()
      This tests get record method In this, one data have been inserted and after insertion the size of the list has been checked Then a new record object has been created and an update operation has been performed at index = ( previous data) Then checked if updated data is present on the list at expected index
